title: Ep. 90 2 Fingers w/Dion Bardeau - Where My Moms At w/ Christina P
description:
SPONSORS: - Go to https://adamandeve.com and enter offer code WMMA for 50% off one item, and 10 free gifts - Go to https://cbdMD.com and enter code YOURMOM for 25% off your next order - Go to https://PlushCare.com/WMMA and start your free 30-day trial! - Head to https://Ancestry.com/WMMA to start your free trial today! - Go to https://juneshine.com/WMMA or use code WMMA at checkout to claim 20% off and free shipping site wide

WHERE MY MOMS AT!? It's the show by the Moms for the Moms. Hosted by everybody's favorite "cool mom" Christina P! Not only the most REAL show for moms, but the most interactive. An open place to admit no one really knows what they're doing.

Dion Bardeau is a screenwriter. He joins Christina P to discuss being raised by a single mother, attempting to reconnect with his father, dating cougars, finding inspiration in music, and more!

Christina P. wants to hear from you since she is seriously lacking in cool mom friends. If you want to share a "Mom Hack," "Pazsitzky Effect," or anything else from the mom world please call into our voicemail (213)375-5184 and let Christina know! We want to talk to as many moms across America as we can.
author: nadav@ymhstudios.com (Christina Pazsitzky)
